mapper.select: select m.menu_id AS menu_id, m.menu_name AS menu_name, m.parent_id AS parent_id, m.order_num AS order_num, m.path AS path, m.component AS component, m.query AS query, m.route_name AS route_name, m.is_frame AS is_frame, m.is_cache AS is_cache, m.menu_type AS menu_type, m.visible AS visible, m.status AS status, m.permission AS permission, m.icon AS icon, m.sort AS sort, m.create_by AS create_by, m.create_time AS create_time, m.update_by AS update_by, m.update_time AS update_time, m.remark AS remark from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id inner join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.visible = 1 order by m.sort asc

select m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.query, m.route_name, m.visible, m.status, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.sort, m.permission, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark from sys_menu m inner join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} order by m.sort

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.query, m.route_name, m.visible, m.status, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.sort, m.permission, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ur.role_id = ro.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = '0' AND ro.status = '0' ORDER BY m.parent_id, m.sort
